tweet:
🚨 Anthropic is sounding the alarm. The AI giant claims DeepSeek and other firms used 'industrial-scale' campaigns—including 24k fraudulent accounts—to scrape Claude data for training their own models.

AI development just got a lot more complicated. 🛡️
